body:
Comment 1 by **evan.christopher.davis**: 
Let me just add, as well, that it starts off with that same symbolic link line:

evan@evan-desktop:~/go/src$ make all
bash /home/evan/go/src/make.bash
make[1]: Entering directory `/home/evan/go/src/lib9'
rm -f *.o *.6 6.out lib9.a
make[1]: execvp: pwd: Too many levels of symbolic links
